scripts.audit:bundle-secrets: if rg -n "(DEEPL_API_KEY|CLERK_SECRET_KEY|DeepL-Auth-Key|sk_live_)" dist --glob '!**/*.map'; then echo "Potential secret found in dist bundle"; exit 1; else echo "No obvious secrets detected in dist bundle"; fi
scripts.test: bun test tests/convex/*.test.ts tests/server/*.test.ts tests/translator/*.test.ts tests/ui/*.test.ts
scripts.test:coverage: bun test --coverage tests/convex/*.test.ts tests/server/*.test.ts tests/translator/*.test.ts tests/ui/*.test.ts
scripts.ci: bun run typecheck && bun run test && vite build
